Package net.regsirius06.engine.utils

package net.regsirius06.engine.utils
This package contains utility classes and interfaces for the engine's functionality. It includes various utility classes for handling 2D graphics, labyrinth management, and other essential components.

The submodules within this package are designed to provide core functionality for the game engine, such as handling the drawing of 2D objects and managing the labyrinth structure.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.regsirius06.engine.utils.help
    This module contains the InfoExecutable class, which provides a convenient base for creating "About" information dialogs for plugins.
    net.regsirius06.engine.utils.panels
    Provides classes and interfaces for rendering and managing graphical panels within the application.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Drawable2D
    This interface represents an object that can be drawn on a 2D graphics context.
